abstract: At the end of last year, the Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship’s programs had reached more than 150,000 students overseas, up from just 1,600 in 2003.
snippet: At the end of last year, the Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship’s programs had reached more than 150,000 students overseas, up from just 1,600 in 2003.
lead_paragraph: In 1981, a gang of teenagers mugged the owner of an import-export business while he was walking on Manhattan’s Lower East Side. They ran off with the contents of his wallet, $10. But Steve Mariotti took away something more valuable: the germ of an idea.

headline.main: A Youth Entrepreneurship Program Goes International

abstract: China is having the final word on Google’s biggest and perhaps most strategic deal to date — its proposed $12.5 billion acquisition of Motorola Mobility, the American handset maker and communications company.
snippet: China is having the final word on Google’s biggest and perhaps most strategic deal to date — its proposed $12.5 billion acquisition of Motorola Mobility, the American handset maker and communications company.
lead_paragraph: In today’s globalized world, you can’t avoid China, or so goes the cliché. Google is discovering that it’s actually true.

headline.main: China Flexes Its Regulatory Muscle, Catching Google in Its Grip
